title: Playing League of Legends on Linux

embed.description: A video tutorial of installing LOL on Linux using PlayOnLinux. Original Tutorial: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflinux/comments/5ukgur/a_revised_guide_for_installing_league_of_legends/ LOL NA installer: http://web.archive.org/web/20151018130808/http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseNA.exe

body: This Youtube video shows you how to set up League of Legends on Linux. Works as of this patch. 15/9/2017

replies.body:
I'm glad you were able to figure something out to get League working on your Linux system! 

Disclaimer to anyone trying this: League isn't officially supported on Linux as of posting this. Please be careful (I didn't have time to watch all of these instructions myself) as we won't be able to help with most Linux issues.
